name: Harpoon
description: A perfect solution for the flight of foes.

abilities.name: Draw Forth
abilities.description: Launches a harpoon that latches onto the target, pulling the caster and the target towards each other, meeting in the middle. Has a maximum pull distance.
notes: When the caster is ranged, pulls the target and the caster for a percentage of the distance instead, but still respecting the max pull distance
Roshan cannot be moved, only the caster gets moved
The projectile travels at a speed of 2000
Does not disable the pulled units, they can still attack, cast abilities and items, and turn during it
Can move the units over impassable terrain
Destroys trees within a 100 radius around the pulled units
Can be cast on debuff immune enemies, pulling the caster, but not the target

abilities.name: Echo Strike
abilities.description: The next attack grants the wielder a buff that greatly increases attack speed for one attack.
notes: The triggering attack also briefly slows the enemy's movement speed. The second attack does not slow
Ranged heroes cannot use Echo Strike
The effect triggers upon reaching the attack point of an attack, regardless of whether the attack lands or not
The attack speed buff has no set duration. It lasts until the user makes a second attack
Uses a custom cooldown system not affected by cooldown manipulation
Does not stack with Falcon Rush

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance
25, 10 and 10 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes respectively
20.25 main attack damage to universal heroes
